item.title: It's Doom For Calling Cards
item.description: Historically, high international call rates have driven people to seek cheaper options like calling cards and VoIP services. While affordable international rates are now more accessible, a new contender is challenging calling card companies for dominance in the international market. This emerging service, known as “dial-around,” was popular before cell phones took over. While most cell phone plans offer nationwide calling, they fall short with international calls, often charging exorbitant rates.
